                <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="Neon Light Spaces by James Turrell" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/james-turrell-00-440x285.jpg"/>
                </noscript>
               </picture>
              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">
               <div>
                <span class="post-categories">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/design-en/" style="color:rgb(229,203,82);">
                  Design
                 </a>
                </span>
                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

                 </a>
                </h4>

               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/colorful-and-creative-arrangements-by-romo-jack/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Romo-440x285.jpg" alt="Colorful and Creative Arrangements by Romo Jack"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/design-en/" style="color:rgb(229,203,82);">
                   Design
                  </a>
                 </span>
                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-video-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/06/25/hias-for-the-refugee-2/">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology-en " id="post-690444">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-graphic-en " id="post-690623">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-graphic-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/09/retro-futuristic-digital-collages-by-khan-nova/">

                 <span class="post-categories">

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/colorful-and-creative-arrangements-by-romo-jack/">

                  </a>
                 </h4>

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-video-en " id="post-689841">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-video-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/06/25/hias-for-the-refugee-2/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/fortherefugee-1-440x285.jpg" alt="HIAS &#8211; For the Refugee"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

       <li class="link-menu link-technology-en" data-color-cat="rgb(128,140,209)" style="border-left-color:rgb( 128,140,209 );">
        <a class="color-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/category/technology-en/">
         Technology
        </a>
        <div class="sub-menu">
         <div class="content-sub-menu" style="border-top-color:rgb( 128,140,209 );">
          <div class="list-cat-menu">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology-en " id="post-690444">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology-en" href="http://www.fubiz.net/en/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-440x285.jpg" alt="Magical Starry Sky in New-Zealand Cave"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

          <div class="content-single color-design-en">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-679996">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               A beautiful work of photographer Taiwanese
               <a href="http://www.flickr.com/people/78546112@N00/">
                Will Ho
               </a>
               that could capture the rendering of millions of luminescent plankton illuminating a range Maldives. They illuminate the entire beach, where the waves hit the sand. Surreal rendering of a sea that sparkles at night. More images after the jump.
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/01/22/bioluminescent-beach-in-maldives/">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-415006" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho1-640x426.jpg" height="426" src="" title="" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-415006" height="426" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho1-640x426.jpg" title="" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <span id="more-679996">
               </span>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/01/22/bioluminescent-beach-in-maldives/willho2/" rel="attachment wp-att-415005">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-415005" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho2-640x960.jpg" height="960" src="" title="willho2" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-415005" height="960" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho2-640x960.jpg" title="willho2" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/01/22/bioluminescent-beach-in-maldives/willho4/" rel="attachment wp-att-415004">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-415004" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho4-640x426.jpg" height="426" src="" title="willho4" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-415004" height="426" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/willho4-640x426.jpg" title="willho4" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>

                <noscript>

                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>

var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);

                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                 <noscript>

                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">

               </picture>
               <div class="hover-img">

    <script>
     fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
    </script>
